body: You can pierce the veil between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often, and to greater effect.
name: Shadow Walker
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/New Racial Rules/Fetchling Feats/Shadow Walker

sections.body: You can expend one use of your shadow walk spell-like ability to use dimension door as a spell-like ability. Your start and end locations for this ability must be in dim light or darkness.
sections.name: Benefit
